author: Typey Type
title: Full Dictionary
tagline: Typey Type’s full dictionary builds on the Plover dictionary with misstrokes removed from the top 10,000 words. Use this instead of Plover’s default main dictionary.

author: Typey Type
title: Slim Dictionary
tagline: Typey Type’s slim dictionary has only 1 outline for each word.

author: Plover
title: Main Jun 3, 2018 (latest)
tagline: Plover’s main dictionary from Jun 3, 2018. This shipped with Plover version weekly-v4.0.0.dev8 on 3 Jul 2018.

author: Plover
title: Main Oct 5, 2016
tagline: Plover’s main dictionary from Oct 5, 2016. This shipped with Plover version weekly-v4.0.0.dev1 on 21 Apr 2017.

author: Plover
title: Commands Jun 3, 2018 (latest)
tagline: Plover’s main dictionary from Jun 3, 2018. This shipped with Plover version weekly-v4.0.0.dev8 on 3 Jul 2018.

author: Di Does Digital
title: Australian English with extra strokes
tagline: Di Does Digital’s Australian English with extra strokes dictionary lets you write Australian/UK/International English variants of words used in stories by appending /A*U to strokes.

author: Di Does Digital
title: Navigation
tagline: Di Does Digital’s Mac navigation dictionary lets you navigate and edit text efficiently. You can move your cursor by letter, word, or line, select while doing so, and also backspace or forward delete by character, word, or line.

author: Di Does Digital
title: Tabbing
tagline: Di Does Digital’s Mac navigation dictionary lets you switch tabs, windows, and apps.

author: Di Does Digital
title: Punctuation
tagline: Di Does Digital’s punctuation dictionary lets you write general punctuation for regular prose.

author: Di Does Digital
title: Symbols
tagline: Di Does Digital’s symbols dictionary lets you write general symbols, such as copyright and trademark characters.

author: Di Does Digital
title: Currency symbols
tagline: Di Does Digital’s currency symbols dictionary lets you write lots of different currency symbols, such as €.

author: Di Does Digital
title: Vim
tagline: Di Does Digital’s Vim dictionary lets you use steno and Vim together.

author: Di Does Digital
title: Modifiers
tagline: Di Does Digital’s modifiers dictionary lets you use key modifiers like Shift (⇧) or Control (⌃).

author: Di Does Digital
title: Single-stroke modifiers
tagline: Di Does Digital’s modifiers dictionary lets you use key modifiers like Shift (⇧) or Control (⌃) with single-stroke shortcuts.

author: Jade-GG
title: Phrasing Dictionary 18 Mar 2019
tagline: Jade-GG’s auto-generated phrasing dictionary lets you write sentences like “I didn’t know that” or “you don’t really care about” in one stroke using a system based on frequency data gathered from Datamuse and from experience. It’s designed to have almost no conflicts with existing Plover theory.
